messages.subject: ukiyo-e prints
messages.msgSnippet: Hey all, Seems like this site has died out, how very sad. Anywho, I was wondering if there were ever any ukiyo-e prints of the shinsengumi made... I don t mean
messages.messageBody:
Hey all,

Seems like this site has died out, how very sad.

Anywho, I was wondering if there were ever any ukiyo-e prints of the shinsengumi made... I don't mean modern ones, but something made back in the day they were alive or even sometime after there disbandment... I was particularly interested in finding one of Saitou Hajime.

Thanks
-G





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
